sentence: The rooms were clean and neat the Lobby was very impressing and most likely the pools are gon na be amazing after they finish the renovation
the new renovations in the resturants and lounge areas are beautiful
Pretty lobby and restaurants all recently redone in the modern Melia style
You could tell the lobby was recently renovated and gave a very nice upscale feel to it
Although the hotel is undergoing renovations it did its best to ensure everyone had a good time
The pictures capture the most updated aspects of the establishment
The buffet was also very good with plenty of choice and it was updated daily
It was purchased in December by the current owner who is in the middle of a huge renovation
we have been coming to this particular hotel for ten years so we know the changes that have occurred and the needed updates
The interior of the hotel has been renovated and is lovely
Again some updates are required around the property but mostly it is very nice

The only complaints that we had during our stay would be the rooms do need to be updated but we were not hardly in our rooms so it did not bother us too much and the bartenders down at the beach did not like to serve our children
In need of a major refresh
As far as the hotel itself there are some places where it use a little upgrading but all in all it was very nice
At the end I had to pay 1850USD for the extra room I had already paid for2 Room was ok need a major reno old but refreshed

When we got to our room it was aceptable had not been refurbished as I was told most rooms for Level guests have been and the balcony was small since it was a corner room and there would be no room for a cot it was also very worn
The rooms were average and could use a facelift but I have been in worse rooms in Beaches Resorts for alot more money
There were also some spots of the hotel that need to be repainted or patched up
If you can please ask to be place in the West Wing as there is renovation going in the East Wing

Wash cloths seem to be in demand as we only saw two of them in 6 days so if you use a wash cloth all the time you can go to the beautiful newly remodeled gym they have them there that you can take to your room
